mapper.select: SELECT stmt_uid, stmt_date regDate, account_uid, stmt_summary summary, stmt_sum money, stmt_writer writer, stmt_manager manager, stmt_approver approver, stmt_proceed proceed FROM tb_statement
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_statement (stmt_uid, stmt_date, account_uid, stmt_summary, stmt_sum money, stmt_writer, stmt_manager, stmt_approver) VALUES (statement_seq.nextval, SYSDATE, #{account_uid}, #{summary}, #{money}, #{writer}, #{manager}, #{approver})
